resources.string:
Objective:

Collect oranges to calm down the angry monkey without letting wasps sting him!

Objects:
Monkey (Player) | Angry Wasps (Enemy) | Oranges (Playerâ€™s food)

Instructions:

 >Drag the monkey from top to bottom, and vice versa by using the tap or motion technique explained below:
i) Tap: Tap your finger to the portion of the screen you want the monkey to move
ii) Motion: Tilt the phone to left or right, or lean the phone towards or against you to perform left, right, up and down motions respectively.
 >Avoid the bees while going from top to bottom, or vice-versa. 

 For any help, business inquiries, or additional support, please contact the OJ International Team at gameojsurprise@gmail.com. We appreciate your help and support.
